title: Encryptic
alt: It was bound to happen eventually. This data theft will enable almost limitless [xkcd.com/792]-style password reuse attacks in the coming weeks. There's only one group that comes out of this looking smart: Everyone who pirated Photoshop.
transcript:
[Caption above the panel:]
Hackers recently leaked 153 million Adobe user emails, encrypted passwords, and password hints.
Adobe encrypted the passwords improperly, misusing block-mode 3DES. The result is something wonderful:[Caption below the panel:]
The greatest crossword puzzle in the history of the world
